title: Your situation regarding language learning
question: QB3. Which of the following situations apply to you?
answers: You have started to learn a new language in the last 2 years
You have continued to learn a language in the last 2 years
You have not learned a language recently, but you intend to start in the coming year
You have not learned a language recently, and you don't intend to start in the coming year
You have never learned any language other than your mother tongue
